page.title: 11Britannia Fair, Kesgrave
page.content:
Britannia School Fair On Saturday 15th June our school had a Summer Fair. Lots of schools have them but I am goimg to describe what it was like. We had to pay 10 pence for a programme. There were two competitions, one to see how many things you could get into a matchbox and one for colouring a picture.
There were 20 stalls altogether, like White Elephant, Books and Records, Toys, Sweets and Grocery, Video cartoons, Badge making, Face painting, Handicraft, Wellie throwing, Pony riding, Grand draw and a Magic Show. There were also refreshments like cakes, Panda-Pops, crisps and icecream. In the White Elephant stall there were quite a few different things like clothes, games and antiques.
